input.name: Optimization of GPCR-based fluorescent sensors for large-scale multiplexed in vivo imaging of neuromodulation
input.citation: Optimization of GPCR-based fluorescent sensors for large-scale multiplexed in vivo imaging of neuromodulation (2022). (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/000300/draft
input.description: This dataset comprises imaging and physiology data generated by the BRAIN Initiative U01 award, Optimization of GPCR-based fluorescent sensors for large-scale multiplexed in vivo imaging of neuromodulation. This will be released following publication of new GPCR based sensors for dopamine, serotonin, acetylcholine and norepinephrine.
